samples.name: FG_CTRL_RANGE
samples.description: Retrieved values outside range using forward model 1

samples.name: FG_CTRL_SIGMA
samples.description: High retrieval sigma using forward model 1

samples.name: FG_CTRL_CHI2
samples.description: Poor fit quality

samples.name: FG_CTRL_CHI2_P
samples.description: Poor fit quality

samples.name: FG_CTRL_SUNGLINT
samples.description: Grid point with number of measurements flagged for sunglint above threshold

samples.name: FG_CTRL_MOONGLINT
samples.description: Grid point with number of measurements flagged for moonglint above threshold

samples.name: FG_CTRL_GAL_NOISE
samples.description: Grid point with number of measurements flagged for galactic noise above threshold

samples.name: FG_CTRL_REACH_MAXITER
samples.description: Maximum number of iteration reached before convergence using forward model 1

samples.name: FG_CTRL_NUM_MEAS_MIN
samples.description: Not processed due to too few valid measurements

samples.name: FG_CTRL_NUM_MEAS_LOW
samples.description: Processed, but with a low number of measurements. Flag set if number of valid measurement < Tg_num_meas_valid

samples.name: FG_CTRL_MANY_OUTLIERS
samples.description: Flag set if number of outliers Dg_num_outliers >Tg_num_outliers_max

samples.name: FG_CTRL_MARQ
samples.description: Iterative loop ends because Marquardt increment is greater than lambdaMax

samples.name: FG_CTRL_ROUGHNESS
samples.description: Roughness correction applied

samples.name: FG_CTRL_FOAM
samples.description: Wind speed is less than Tg_WS_foam and foam contribution and foam fraction are set to zero

samples.name: FG_CTRL_ECMWF
samples.description: Flag set to false if one or more ECMWF data is missing for the different models

samples.name: FG_CTRL_VALID
samples.description: Flags raised if grid points pass grid point measurement discrimination tests

samples.name: FG_CTRL_NO_SURFACE
samples.description: Flags raised if the 42.5° angle is not included in the dwell line for grid points

samples.name: FG_CTRL_RANGE_ACARD
samples.description: Flags raised if retrieved Acard is outside range

samples.name: FG_CTRL_SIGMA_ACARD
samples.description: Flags raised if retrieved Acard sigma is too high

samples.name: FG_CTRL_QUALITY_ACARD
samples.description: Flags raised if at least one critical flag was raised during Acard retrieval

samples.name: FG_CTRL_USED_FARATEC
samples.description: Flags raised if TEC for this grid point was obtained from AUX_FARA_x

samples.name: FG_CTRL_POOR_GEOPHYS
samples.description: Flags set if this grid point probably has poor quality SSS due to geophysical problems (outliers, glint, etc), or FG_CTRL_VALID is false

samples.name: FG_CTRL_POOR_RETRIEVAL
samples.description: Flags set if this grid point poor SSS due to retrieval failure, poor quality convergence, or FG_CTRL_VALID is false. Poor SSS quality retrieval may be caused by retrieval problems

samples.name: FG_CTRL_SUSPECT_RFI
samples.description: Grid point is suspected of being contaminated by RFI. Flag set if Dg_RFI_L2 / Dg_num_meas_L1 > Tg_num_RFI_max

samples.name: FG_CTRL_RFI_PRONE_X
samples.description: Grid point is likely to be contaminated by X polarization RFI as indicated by AUX_DGGRFI

samples.name: FG_CTRL_RFI_PRONE_Y
samples.description: Grid point is likely to be contaminated by Y polarization RFI as indicated by AUX_DGGRFI

samples.name: FG_CTRL_ADJUSTED_RA
samples.description: Set if radiometric accuracy of measurements on this grid point have been adjusted using AUX_DGGRFI

samples.name: FG_CTRL_RETRIEV_FAIL
samples.description: Flags raised if iterative scheme returns an error

samples.name: FG_SC_LAND_SEA_COAST1
samples.description: Distance from coast to gridpoint is less than threshold Max1 in file AUX_DISTAN

samples.name: FG_SC_LAND_SEA_COAST2
samples.description: Distance from coast to gridpoint is less than threshold Max2 in file AUX_DISTAN

samples.name: FG_SC_TEC_GRADIENT
samples.description: High TEC gradient along dwell for a grid point

samples.name: FG_SC_IN_CLIM_ICE
samples.description: Gridpoint with maximum extend of sea ice accordy to monthly climatology

samples.name: FG_SC_ICE
samples.description: Ice concentration at gridpoint is above threshold Tg_ice_concentration

samples.name: FG_SC_SUSPECT_ICE
samples.description: Suspect ice on gridpoint

samples.name: FG_SC_RAIN
samples.description: Heavy rain suspected on gridpoint. Rain rate is above threshold Tg_max_rainfall

samples.name: FG_SC_HIGH_WIND
samples.description: High wind

samples.name: FG_SC_LOW_WIND
samples.description: Low wind

samples.name: FG_SC_LOW_SSS
samples.description: Low SSS

samples.description: Sea state class 1

samples.description: Sea state class 6

samples.name: FG_SC_ICE_ACARD
samples.description: Ice flag from cardioid

samples.name: USGS_SEA_FLAG
samples.description: Water fraction is above 95 percent (1); below 95 percent (0)

samples.name: USGS_LAND_FLAG
samples.description: Water fraction is below 10 percent (1); above 10 percent (0)

samples.name: USGS_MIXED_FLAG
samples.description: Water fraction is above 10 and below 95 percent (1); below 10 or above 95 percent (0)

samples.name: 200_KM_COASTAL_FLAG
samples.description: Distance to coastline is less than 200 km (1); greater than 200 km (0)

samples.name: 100_KM_COASTAL_FLAG
samples.description: Distance to coastline is less than 100 km (1); greater than 100 km (0)

samples.name: 40_KM_COASTAL_FLAG
samples.description: Distance to coastline is less than 40 km (1); greater than 40 km (0)

samples.name: MIN_SEA_ICE_FLAG
samples.description: Sea ice is present for all months (1); is not present for all months (0)

samples.name: MAX_SEA_ICE_FLAG
samples.description: Sea ice is present for any months (1); is not present for any months (0)

bands.name: Dg_Suspect_ice
bands.description: Number of suspected ice contaminated measurements

bands.name: Dg_moonglint

masks.name: Control_Flags_4_FG_CTRL_VALID
masks.description: Flags raised if grid points pass grid point measurement discrimination tests

masks.name: Control_Flags_4_FG_CTRL_NO_SURFACE
masks.description: Flags raised if the 42.5° angle is not included in the dwell line for grid points

masks.name: Control_Flags_4_FG_CTRL_RANGE_ACARD
masks.description: Flags raised if retrieved Acard is outside range

masks.name: Control_Flags_4_FG_CTRL_SIGMA_ACARD
masks.description: Flags raised if retrieved Acard sigma is too high

masks.name: Control_Flags_4_FG_CTRL_QUALITY_ACARD
masks.description: Flags raised if at least one critical flag was raised during Acard retrieval

masks.name: Control_Flags_4_FG_CTRL_USED_FARATEC
masks.description: Flags raised if TEC for this grid point was obtained from AUX_FARA_x

masks.name: Control_Flags_4_FG_CTRL_POOR_GEOPHYS
masks.description: Flags set if this grid point probably has poor quality SSS due to geophysical problems (outliers, glint, etc), or FG_CTRL_VALID is false

masks.name: Control_Flags_4_FG_CTRL_POOR_RETRIEVAL
masks.description: Flags set if this grid point poor SSS due to retrieval failure, poor quality convergence, or FG_CTRL_VALID is false. Poor SSS quality retrieval may be caused by retrieval problems

masks.name: Control_Flags_4_FG_CTRL_SUSPECT_RFI
masks.description: Grid point is suspected of being contaminated by RFI. Flag set if Dg_RFI_L2 / Dg_num_meas_L1 > Tg_num_RFI_max

masks.name: Control_Flags_4_FG_CTRL_RFI_PRONE_X
masks.description: Grid point is likely to be contaminated by X polarization RFI as indicated by AUX_DGGRFI

masks.name: Control_Flags_4_FG_CTRL_RFI_PRONE_Y
masks.description: Grid point is likely to be contaminated by Y polarization RFI as indicated by AUX_DGGRFI

masks.name: Control_Flags_4_FG_CTRL_ADJUSTED_RA
masks.description: Set if radiometric accuracy of measurements on this grid point have been adjusted using AUX_DGGRFI

masks.name: Control_Flags_4_FG_CTRL_RETRIEV_FAIL
masks.description: Flags raised if iterative scheme returns an error

masks.name: Science_Flags_1_FG_SC_LAND_SEA_COAST1
masks.description: Distance from coast to gridpoint is less than threshold Max1 in file AUX_DISTAN

masks.name: Science_Flags_1_FG_SC_LAND_SEA_COAST2
masks.description: Distance from coast to gridpoint is less than threshold Max2 in file AUX_DISTAN

masks.name: Science_Flags_1_FG_SC_TEC_GRADIENT
masks.description: High TEC gradient along dwell for a grid point

masks.name: Science_Flags_1_FG_SC_IN_CLIM_ICE
masks.description: Gridpoint with maximum extend of sea ice accordy to monthly climatology

masks.name: Science_Flags_1_FG_SC_ICE
masks.description: Ice concentration at gridpoint is above threshold Tg_ice_concentration

masks.name: Science_Flags_1_FG_SC_SUSPECT_ICE
masks.description: Suspect ice on gridpoint

masks.name: Science_Flags_1_FG_SC_RAIN
masks.description: Heavy rain suspected on gridpoint. Rain rate is above threshold Tg_max_rainfall

masks.description: High wind

masks.name: Land_Sea_Mask_USGS_SEA_FLAG
masks.description: Water fraction is above 95 percent (1); below 95 percent (0)

masks.name: Land_Sea_Mask_USGS_LAND_FLAG
masks.description: Water fraction is below 10 percent (1); above 10 percent (0)

masks.name: Land_Sea_Mask_USGS_MIXED_FLAG
masks.description: Water fraction is above 10 and below 95 percent (1); below 10 or above 95 percent (0)

masks.name: Land_Sea_Mask_200_KM_COASTAL_FLAG
masks.description: Distance to coastline is less than 200 km (1); greater than 200 km (0)

masks.name: Land_Sea_Mask_100_KM_COASTAL_FLAG
masks.description: Distance to coastline is less than 100 km (1); greater than 100 km (0)

masks.name: Land_Sea_Mask_40_KM_COASTAL_FLAG
masks.description: Distance to coastline is less than 40 km (1); greater than 40 km (0)

masks.name: Land_Sea_Mask_MIN_SEA_ICE_FLAG
masks.description: Sea ice is present for all months (1); is not present for all months (0)

masks.name: Land_Sea_Mask_MAX_SEA_ICE_FLAG
masks.description: Sea ice is present for any months (1); is not present for any months (0)
